code:
graph TD
    %% Subgraphs: Organized by Functional Role

    %% Thalamus
    subgraph Thalamus[FinTech_AuthVault]
        sovl_main[FinTech_LedgerService]
        sovl_conductor[FinTech_FraudDetection]
        sovl_events[FinTech_TransactionQueue]
    end

    %% Cerebellum
    subgraph Cerebellum[FinTech_TransactionQueue]
        sovl_monitor[FinTech_PaymentGateway]
        sovl_memory[FinTech_PaymentGateway]
        sovl_resource[FinTech_TransactionQueue]
        sovl_cli[FinTech_FraudDetection]
    end

    %% Reticular Formation
    subgraph Reticular_Formation[FinTech_FraudDetection]
        sovl_processor[FinTech_LedgerService]
        sovl_utils[FinTech_FraudDetection]
        sovl_io[FinTech_TransactionQueue]
    end

    %% Ganglia
    subgraph Ganglia[FinTech_TransactionQueue]
        sovl_config[FinTech_TransactionQueue]
        sovl_schema[FinTech_FraudDetection]
    end

    %% Cerebral Cortex 
    subgraph Cerebral_Cortex[FinTech_LedgerService]
        sovl_generation[FinTech_FraudDetection]
        sovl_primer[FinTech_LedgerService]
    end

    %% Limbic System
    subgraph Limbic_System[FinTech_LedgerService]
        sovl_curiosity[FinTech_TransactionQueue]
        sovl_temperament[FinTech_PaymentGateway]
        sovl_confidence[FinTech_LedgerService]
        sovl_bonder[FinTech_FraudDetection]
        sovl_meditator[FinTech_LedgerService]
        sovl_viber[FinTech_FraudDetection]
        sovl_striver[FinTech_PaymentGateway]
    end

    %% Hippocampus
    subgraph Hippocampus[FinTech_TransactionQueue]
        sovl_scaffold[FinTech_LedgerService]
        sovl_engram[FinTech_PaymentGateway]
        sovl_manager[FinTech_AuthVault]
        sovl_recaller[FinTech_AuthVault]
    end

    %% Insula
    subgraph Insula[FinTech_FraudDetection]
        sovl_trainer[FinTech_LedgerService]
        sovl_queue[FinTech_LedgerService]
        sovl_scribe[FinTech_FraudDetection]
    end

    %% Motor Cortex
    subgraph Motor_Cortex[FinTech_TransactionQueue]
        sovl_volition[FinTech_PaymentGateway]
        sovl_gate[FinTech_AuthVault]
    end

    %% Pineal Gland 
    subgraph Pineal_Gland[FinTech_FraudDetection]
        sovl_printer[FinTech_PaymentGateway]
        sovl_fuser[FinTech_PaymentGateway]
    end

    %% Broca
    subgraph Broca[FinTech_LedgerService]
        sovl_swarm[FinTech_FraudDetection]
    end

    %% Hypothalamus
    subgraph Hypothalamus[FinTech_PaymentGateway]
        sovl_error[FinTech_PaymentGateway]
        sovl_logger[FinTech_LedgerService]
        sovl_records[FinTech_LedgerService]
    end

    %% Glial Network
    subgraph Glial_Network[FinTech_LedgerService]
        sovl_interfaces[FinTech_AuthVault]
        sovl_hardware[FinTech_TransactionQueue]
        sovl_data[FinTech_AuthVault]
        sovl_state[FinTech_AuthVault]
    end

    %% Janus
    subgraph Janus[FinTech_LedgerService]
        run_sovl[FinTech_TransactionQueue]
    end

    %% Data Store
    subgraph Data_Store[FinTech_TransactionQueue]
        chronicle[FinTech_FraudDetection]
    end

    %% Flows: Grouped by Function
    %% 1. Entry and Orchestration
    run_sovl --> sovl_main
    run_sovl --> sovl_cli
    sovl_main <--> sovl_conductor
    sovl_main <--> sovl_events

    %% 2. Configuration
    sovl_schema --> sovl_config
    sovl_config --> sovl_main
    sovl_config --> sovl_generation
    sovl_config --> sovl_trainer

    %% 3. Sensory and Support
    sovl_monitor --> sovl_main
    sovl_memory --> sovl_main
    sovl_resource --> sovl_main
    sovl_cli --> sovl_main
    sovl_monitor --> sovl_cli
    sovl_processor --> sovl_main
    sovl_utils --> sovl_main
    sovl_io --> sovl_main
    sovl_processor --> sovl_generation
    sovl_utils --> sovl_generation
    sovl_io --> sovl_generation
    sovl_processor --> sovl_trainer
    sovl_utils --> sovl_trainer
    sovl_io --> sovl_trainer

    %% 4. Emotional and Cognitive Processing
    sovl_curiosity --> sovl_primer
    sovl_temperament --> sovl_primer
    sovl_confidence --> sovl_primer
    sovl_bonder --> sovl_primer
    sovl_meditator --> sovl_primer
    sovl_primer --> sovl_generation
    sovl_cli -->|Talk| sovl_main --> sovl_generation
    sovl_curiosity --> sovl_viber
    sovl_temperament --> sovl_viber
    sovl_viber --> sovl_primer
    sovl_viber <--> sovl_recaller
    sovl_striver --> sovl_primer

    %% 5. Memory and Learning
    sovl_engram <--> sovl_scaffold
    sovl_manager --> sovl_scaffold
    sovl_recaller --> sovl_generation
    sovl_scaffold --> sovl_main
    sovl_queue --> sovl_scribe
    sovl_scribe --> sovl_trainer
    sovl_scribe --> sovl_scaffold
    sovl_swarm --> sovl_scaffold
    sovl_swarm --> sovl_engram
    sovl_scribe -- creates --> chronicle
    chronicle -- used by --> sovl_trainer
    sovl_recaller --> sovl_generation

    %% 6. Action and Output
    sovl_volition <--> sovl_main
    sovl_gate --> sovl_volition
    sovl_main <--> sovl_printer
    sovl_main --> sovl_fuser

    %% 7. Regulation
    sovl_main --> sovl_error
    sovl_generation --> sovl_error
    sovl_trainer --> sovl_error
    sovl_main --> sovl_logger
    sovl_generation --> sovl_logger
    sovl_trainer --> sovl_logger
    sovl_memory --> sovl_hardware
    sovl_main --> sovl_interfaces
    sovl_state --> sovl_interfaces
    sovl_conductor --> sovl_interfaces

    %% 8. State
    sovl_state --> sovl_data
    sovl_main --> sovl_state
    sovl_bonder --> sovl_state
